source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT * FROM [staging].[FileLoadDefinition]
WHERE FileRefID NOT IN (SELECT FileRefID FROM [staging].[FileLog])

value.value: @if(equals(item().FileType,7), activity('Load Stage - Cleaned').output.rowsCopied, sub(activity('Load Stage - Cleaned').output.rowsCopied, 1))
@if(equals(item().FileType,7), activity('Load Stage - Uncleaned').output.rowsCopied, sub(activity('Load Stage - Uncleaned').output.rowsCopied, 1))

activities.name: Insert File Log - Get Zip Fail
